headline.print_headline: Texas Town Could Rebuild Plant After Fatal Blast
headline.main: Texas Town Could Rebuild Plant After Fatal Blast

docs.snippet: The mayor of a Texas town where a fertilizer plant explosion killed 15 people says local officials are considering building a new one....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mayor of a Texas town where a fertilizer plant explosion killed 15 people says local officials are considering building a new one.

docs.snippet: La Réserve Hotel and Spa in Geneva is offering a rejuvenation-focused program developed by Nescens....
docs.abstract: La Réserve Hotel and Spa in Geneva is offering a rejuvenation-focused program developed by Nescens.

headline.print_headline: Record Labels Sue Pandora Over Older Songs
headline.main: Record Labels Sue Pandora Over Older Songs

docs.snippet: Major record labels are suing Internet radio giant Pandora for copyright infringement for using songs recorded before 1972 without paying license fees....
docs.lead_paragraph: Major record labels are suing Internet radio giant Pandora for copyright infringement for using songs recorded before 1972 without paying license fees.

headline.print_headline: Singer Chris Brown's Bodyguard on Trial for Assault
headline.main: Singer Chris Brown's Bodyguard on Trial for Assault

docs.snippet: A man who accused singer Chris Brown and his bodyguard of breaking his nose testified on Thursday that the R&B artist punched him because he did not want to pose for a photo....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who accused singer Chris Brown and his bodyguard of breaking his nose testified on Thursday that the R&B artist punched him because he did not want to pose for a photo.

headline.print_headline: No Charges for Wrestlers in Lynching Photo
headline.main: No Charges for Wrestlers in Lynching Photo

docs.snippet: A New Jersey prosecutor says no charges will be filed against the members of a high school wrestling team who posed in a photograph that simulated a lynching....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New Jersey prosecutor says no charges will be filed against the members of a high school wrestling team who posed in a photograph that simulated a lynching.

headline.sub: Jury hears opening arguments in trial of radical Muslim cleric
headline.main: Jury hears opening arguments in trial of radical Muslim cleric

docs.snippet: Abu Hamza al-Masri faces various terrorism-related charges in a New York federal court. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Abu Hamza al-Masri faces various terrorism-related charges in a New York federal court. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.print_headline: Tigers Hold On for 7-5 Win Over Indians
headline.main: Tigers Hold On for 7-5 Win Over Indians

docs.snippet: Ian Kinsler's first few weeks with Detroit have been just what the Tigers were hoping for....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ian Kinsler's first few weeks with Detroit have been just what the Tigers were hoping for.

headline.print_headline: Gov't: Case Against a Blackwater Guard in Jeopardy
headline.main: Gov't: Case Against a Blackwater Guard in Jeopardy

docs.snippet: The government says its criminal case against a former Blackwater security guard is in jeopardy as a June 11 trial looms on charges stemming from the shootings of dozens of Iraqi citizens in an incident in Baghdad nearly seven years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: The government says its criminal case against a former Blackwater security guard is in jeopardy as a June 11 trial looms on charges stemming from the shootings of dozens of Iraqi citizens in an incident in Baghdad nearly seven years ago.

headline.print_headline: Retailer Michaels Stores Confirms Payment Card Data Breach
headline.main: Retailer Michaels Stores Confirms Payment Card Data Breach

docs.snippet: Michaels Stores Inc, the biggest U.S. arts and crafts retailer, on Thursday confirmed that there was a security breach at certain systems that process payment cards at its U.S. stores and that of its unit, Aaron Brothers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michaels Stores Inc, the biggest U.S. arts and crafts retailer, on Thursday confirmed that there was a security breach at certain systems that process payment cards at its U.S. stores and that of its unit, Aaron Brothers.

headline.print_headline: Cost to Buy F-35 Up 2 Percent; To Operate Down 9 Percent: Pentagon
headline.main: Cost to Buy F-35 Up 2 Percent; To Operate Down 9 Percent: Pentagon

docs.snippet: The Pentagon on Thursday forecast the cost of developing and buying Lockheed Martin Corp's F-35 fighter jet at $398.6 billion, up 2 percent from last year, but said the projected cost to operate and maintain the jets was down about 9 percent....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pentagon on Thursday forecast the cost of developing and buying Lockheed Martin Corp's F-35 fighter jet at $398.6 billion, up 2 percent from last year, but said the projected cost to operate and maintain the jets was down about 9 percent.
